EmailTemplate.description: This e-mail should be used to notify management of assessment completion.
EmailTemplate.name: (ExAM) Notify Management of Assessment Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification to Manager (Assessment Complete)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!IssueRequest_Life_Cycle__c.Assessor_Resource__c},
A new task {!IssueRequest_Life_Cycle__c.Link} has been assigned to you. Please take appropriate action.
Thanks
Management Team
